Key Match Events: The Cubs rallied for the tying and go-ahead runs in a five-run eighth inning, when the Los Angeles Dodgers committed three errors in a 6-3 loss to Chicago on Tuesday night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was a matchup of Japanese star pitchers Shota Imanaga and Yoshinobu Yamamoto.
Others: The Cubs beat the Dodgers 6-3, and the current series is now 2-1 in favor of the Cubs.
